definition: sailing on the sea of learning (idiom)

sentences.english: I remember how one moonlit evening we went up this river in a little boat.
sentences.chinese: 我記得，在一個月夜，我們怎樣地泛舟溯河而上。

sentences.english: Undulator oar, boating on the lake, Fun for all at.
sentences.chinese: 凌波盪槳，泛舟湖上，其樂無窮。

sentences.english: Willows sweeping gently, moonlight pavilioning the lotus pond, there come four people, the host along with servants by boat.
sentences.chinese: 畫面楊柳輕拂，荷塘月色，主僕四人泛舟而來。

sentences.english: Rafting roaming and saw a reflection of the lake-green water lake, full of poetic.
sentences.chinese: 泛舟漫遊，只見一湖綠水半湖倒影，充滿詩情畫意。

sentences.english: They rowed a boat on the riverto view the beautiful landscape on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 他們在河上泛舟欣賞兩岸美麗的風景。

sentences.english: Boating on the river, you will fully appreciate the "Southern Tang state building" in the history of heavy.
sentences.chinese: 泛舟河上，您會充分領略到“州建南唐”的歷史厚重。

sentences.english: Can you picture yourself on a boat, on a river?
sentences.chinese: 你能想象你自己泛舟河上的情景嗎？

sentences.english: We could take a boat on the lake and have dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以在湖上泛舟，就餐。

sentences.english: Here is a record of a boat trip around Suzhou.
sentences.chinese: 爲感受蘇州古城新貌，泛舟一遊，特此記錄。

sentences.english: As much as running wild rivers, writing is an act of exploration.
sentences.chinese: 如同在奔騰的江河上泛舟，寫作也是一種探索。

definition: water and sky merge in one color (idiom)
scenic lakes and mountain (idiom); beautiful lake and mountain landscape
to embark/to travel by ship/to ferry
to scull (with a single oar, usually mounted on the stern of the boat)
to wander about unhurriedly/to linger/to loiter
